## layout: page title: "Ascii Draw"

<a rel="me" href="https://github.com/Fekinox/ascii-draw">
    Github
</a>

An art program that runs entirely in your terminal emulator!

![The completed image from Advent of Code 2016](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/20966518/408221153-73e3e943-8f18-46f5-b70c-1fe19d9e285f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..MhQIfMymo10f-vkCF1GXw4PR1qfgaffk1LZgwUKt7E4)

*(Sample image is the completed calendar from [Advent of Code 2016](https://adventofcode.com/2016))*
